amendment.description: Amendment decommissions the Coast Guard Cutter STORIS to the nonprofit organization in Juneau, Alaska, for use as a historic memorial.
amendment.purpose: An amendment pertaining to the the Conveyance of Decommissioned Coast Guard Cutter STORIS.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Young (AK) amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Young (AK).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Young (AK) amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
